column1: Here are the latest clients for the requested OSs:

Yes, the links to the downloads were what I was after. Thank you for providing them, you can close the ticket.
Betreff: RE: 00441433 - Updated Clients for Ubuntu 24.04/22.04 and Fedora 40/41
ACHTUNG: Diese E-Mail stammt von einem externen Absender. Bitte vermeide es, Anhänge oder externe Links zu öffnen.

I’m reaching out to see if the instructions I sent in my last email helped resolve the issue you were experiencing. I haven’t heard back from you, so I wanted to check if everything is working smoothly now or if you still need further assistance.
If you’re all set, just let me know, and I can close the ticket. If you still need help or have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out—I’m here to support you.
Ticket Subject: Updated Clients for Ubuntu 24.04/22.04 and Fedora 40/41
Ticket Details: I'd like to request the latest client software packages for Linux. I'd like to get the latest version available for Ubuntu 22.04, Ubuntu 24.04, Fedora 40, and Fedora 41 respectively.
